com.sample.client
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  com.sample.client.Connection
public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a client side connection to a Sample Server.

                  int portNumber,
                  int timeout)
           throws java.io.IOException,

Constructor.

Parameters:
hostName - Sample Server host name
portNumber - Sample Server port number
timeout - timeout in the milliseconds
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - if a host is not reachable
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

beginTransaction

public Document beginTransaction()
                          throws java.io.IOException
Requests Sample Server to start a new transaction.

Returns:
an ACKNOWLEDGEMENT document if successful or a NEGATIVE ACKNOWLEDGEMENT document if the request fails.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

requestNotificationList

public Document requestNotificationList()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Requests a list of all the listener notification types available from the Sample Server.

Returns:
a Document that encapsulates all of the available listener notifications from the Sample server. The document type is Document.NOTIFICATION_LIST. There is only one field, called Document.NOTIFICATION_NAME, and the value of an array of String containing the names of the listener notifications.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

requestNotificationSignature

public Document requestNotificationSignature(java.lang.String notificationName)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Requests a listener notification output parameter signature from the Sample Server.

Returns:
a Document encapsulating notification signature from the Sample Server with type Document.NOTIFICATION_SIGNATURE. There are two fields in the document. The first field is Document.NOTIFICATION_NAME with the value of the requested listener notification type. The second field is Document.NOTIFICATION_OUTPUT_SIGNATURE. Each field in this signature document has a name reflecting the output field name and the value of a string name for a Java data type class name. If the output field will be an array, the class name will be represented in the first element of a string array.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

requestPollingList

public Document requestPollingList()
                            throws java.io.IOException
Requests a list of all the polling notification types available from the Sample Server.

Returns:
a Document encapsulating all of the available polling notification types from the Sample Server. The document type is Document.POLLING_LIST. There is only one field with the name of Document.POLLING_NAMES and the value of an array of String containing the names of all of the polling notification types.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

requestPollingSignature

public Document requestPollingSignature(java.lang.String pollingName)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Requests a polling input/output parameter signature from the Sample Server.

Returns:
a Document encapsulating polling signature from the Sample Server with the document type Document.POLLING_SIGNATURE. There are three fields in the document. The first field is Document.POLLING_NAME with the value of the request polling notification type. The second field is Document.POLLING_INPUT_SIGNATURE the third field is Document.POLLING_INPUT_SIGNATURE. Both signature fields contain either a null value or a Document. Each field of this signature document has a name reflecting the parameter field name and the value of a string name for a Java data type class name. If the field needs an array as the parameter, the class name will be represented in the first element of a string array.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

requestServiceList

public Document requestServiceList()
                            throws java.io.IOException
Requests a list of all the services available from the Sample Server.

Returns:
a Document encapsulating all of the available services from the Sample Server with the document type Document.SERVICE_LIST. There is only one field, Document.SERVICE_LIST, and the value of an array of String containing the names of all the services.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

requestServiceSignature

public Document requestServiceSignature(java.lang.String serviceName)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Requests a service input/output parameter signature from the Sample Server.

Returns:
a Document encapsulating service signature from the Sample Server with the document type Document.SERVICE_SIGNATURE. There are three fields in the document. The first field is Document.SERVICE_NAME with the value of the request service name. The second field is Document.SERVICE_INPUT_SIGNATURE. The third field is Document.SERVICE_INPUT_SIGNATURE. Both signature fields contain either a null value or a Document. Each field of this signature document has a name reflecting the parameter field name and the value of a string name for a Java data type class name. If the field needs an array as the parameter, the class name will be represented in the first element of a string array.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem

rollbackTransaction

public Document rollbackTransaction()
                             throws java.io.IOException
Requests the Sample Server to rollback the transaction.

Returns:
an ACKNOWLEDGEMENT document if successful or a NEGATIVE ACKNOWLEDGEMENT document if the request fails.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if it encounters a communication problem
